mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_PERMIT ( PERMIT_ID , PERMIT_NAME , PERMIT_DESC , CRT_ID , CRT_DT , UPT_ID , UPT_DT ) VALUES ( #{permitId}, #{permitName}, #{permitDesc}, #{crtId}, NOW(), #{uptId}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_PERMIT SET PERMIT_NAME = #{permitName}, PERMIT_DESC = #{permitDesc}, UPT_ID = #{uptId}, UPT_DT = NOW() WHERE PERMIT_ID = #{permitId}
